interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ZWIFEJIANQ Silicone Back Scrubber,Exfoliating Lengthen Silicone Bath Body Brush for Men and Women,Deep Clean & Invigorate Your Skin(30 inch, Green)
Review Date: 2020/10/14
Store: ZWIFEJIANQ
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.28 x 4.65 x 2.17 inches; 7.83 Ounces', 'UPC': '781076826113'}
Review Text: I ordered this for my sister, and this is what she had to say:  She wanted it because she thought it would be exfoliating.  The bumpy side feels really nice but she was unsure of it's purpose outside of a general massage.  The scrubbing side of it also felt great, but she didn't trust that is was actually cleansing her back because the bristles are so soft.  She wishes it were longer; it doesn't stretch so she was limited in her range of motion while cleansing her back.  After using this body brush she said she still felt like she needed to follow up with a wash cloth to ensure that her body was cleansed to her liking.
Review Title: A little better than okay
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Mtmei hair 5Packs 10" Pre-twisted Spring Twist Hair Crochet Braids 15 Strands/Pack Nubian Bomb Twist Crochet Hair Messy Fluffy Spring Twist Crochet Hair Extensions(T27)
Mtmei hair
{'Brand': 'Mtmei hair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '10 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '9.02 x 7.52 x 2.76 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '765470972508'}
There are pros and cons to this hair.  This hair is very soft and very stretchy, so it can be pulled back out of your face. I love that this came with a crochet hook.  The T27 color is pretty BUT it is very frizzy, especially on the blonde ends.  It came straight out of the package frizzy, so I was very disappointed.  It looks like hair that has been in someone's hair for 2-3 weeks before I received it.  it's possible to make the 5 packs work, but I would've preferred to have 6 packs of hair included to make sure there weren't too many gaps without any colored hair, especially since my natural hair color is dark brown.  Overall the hair is just OK.  Next time I'll go for hair that is a better quality.
It's OK
zelaxy Mask Strap Extenders, Soft Silicone Mask Holders for Relieve Ear Pain Caused by Mask (Dot)
zelaxy
{'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 4.7 x 0.2 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'zelaxy'}
These Mask Strap Extenders are so comfortable! They're soft and it's easy to forget you have them on.  I love how they help keep my masks that are too large in place and snug where they need to be.  I love that there's no pressure on my ears whatsoever! These are phenomenal.  I highly recommend!
Comfortable and Necessary
Ombre Burgundy Prelooped Bomb Twist Crochet Hair Prelooped Crochet Braids 18 Inch
UHair
{'Brand': 'UHair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Sew-In', 'Package Dimensions': '12.95 x 9.41 x 3.19 inches; 2.09 Pounds'}
I love this hair! It's GORGEOUS!!!  The color is perfect.  I love that these look neat and uniform.  The ends are curled to perfection.  There is definitely enough hair included to complete your full head without too many gaps.  The orange thing included looks more like a wrist band than a hair tie, but use it as you see fit.  This hair is phenomenal.  I highly recommend.
LOVE!!!!
Toyotress Sierra Passion Braid Crochet Hair - 24 inch 8 Packs Jumbo Box Braids with Curly End Synthetic Braiding Hair Extensions (24 Inch, 1B)
ToyoTress
{'Brand': 'ToyoTress', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '24 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '14.61 x 10.28 x 3.31 inches; 2.14 Pounds'}
I was hesitant to order these because I didn't think I'd like the design of the braids, but after receiving them they are beautiful.  They look really nice when completely installed.  These are neat, and frizz free.  I prefer to wash my hair before the install to remove any smell the hair may have picked up in transit.  I cannot say enough about this hair.  Buy it now! I highly recommend!
Beautiful!
YsesoAi 28 Pcs Hair Curlers Spiral Curls No Heat Wave Hair Curlers Styling Kit Spiral Hair Curlers Magic Hair Rollers with 2 Pieces Styling Hooks for Most Kinds of Hairstyles (20 cm/ 7.8 inches)
YsesoAi
{'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Brand': 'YsesoAi', 'Color': 'Pink, Blue, Ivory, Yellow, Green', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.5 x 1.7 x 1.1 inches', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.7 x 1.1 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '745895771436'}
My hair is just about too long for these, so I won't be getting much use out of them.  These do not look like it would be easy to achieve spiral curls with these rollers, because they roll straight on themselves like regular rollers, and do not come looking spiral like the advertisement picture suggests! I feel mislead! I'm sure I could try to get the outcome to look spiral but I do not have high hopes.  I would suggest a different product that arrives looking just like the picture in advertisement.
For Short Hair Only!
ZWIFEJIANQ Silicone Back Scrubber,Exfoliating Lengthen Silicone Bath Body Brush for Men and Women,Deep Clean & Invigorate Your Skin(30 inch, Green)
ZWIFEJIANQ
{'Package Dimensions': '7.28 x 4.65 x 2.17 inches; 7.83 Ounces', 'UPC': '781076826113'}
I ordered this for my sister, and this is what she had to say:  She wanted it because she thought it would be exfoliating.  The bumpy side feels really nice but she was unsure of it's purpose outside of a general massage.  The scrubbing side of it also felt great, but she didn't trust that is was actually cleansing her back because the bristles are so soft.  She wishes it were longer; it doesn't stretch so she was limited in her range of motion while cleansing her back.  After using this body brush she said she still felt like she needed to follow up with a wash cloth to ensure that her body was cleansed to her liking.
A little better than okay
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user remains engaged with hair extensions, especially vibrant, trendy styles like crochet and braids, and continues to explore longer styles for diverse looks. 

- **Quality Sensitivity:** A strong emphasis on high-quality materials persists. Recent feedback highlights satisfaction with neatness and frizz-free products, solidifying their appreciation for well-crafted items.

- **Color and Design Considerations:** The user values hair colors that harmonize with their natural shade and shows an increasing willingness to experiment with diverse styles.

- **Packaging Expectations:** Consistent expectations for sufficient quantities in packs are maintained to ensure full coverage during installations based on previous experiences.

- **Practicality with Tools and Accessories:** There is a keen appreciation for practical inclusions and ease of use, alongside a focus on comfort. The user remains open to innovative accessories that enhance their experience.

- **Comfort and Functionality:** The user prioritizes products that merge comfort with usability, balancing aesthetic appeal with functional needs.

- **Overall Attitude:** A generally positive outlook towards product experiences is evident, though recent interactions with styling tools have drawn attention to occasional dissatisfaction regarding the effectiveness versus advertising claims, particularly for specific hair types. 

- **New Insights:** A recent purchase reflects the user's interest in personal care items, revealing a consideration for products that emphasize exfoliation and cleansing, although some limitations were noted regarding efficacy, indicating a discerning approach to personal care choices.
